name: Aim High
oracle_text: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"A slayer gets by on wits and reflexes."
—Higa, slayer-captain of Gatstaf

name: Alms of the Vein
oracle_text:
Target opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
Madness {B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Angelic Purge
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a permanent.
Exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment.
flavor_text: "We must save you from yourselves."

name: Apothecary Geist
oracle_text:
Flying
When Apothecary Geist enters the battlefield, if you control another Spirit, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: For some customers, the old apothecary shop still opens its doors.

name: Bloodmad Vampire
oracle_text:
Whenever Bloodmad Vampire deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Byway Courier
oracle_text: When Byway Courier dies, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor_text: A good courier travels fast and asks no questions.

name: Catalog
oracle_text: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
flavor_text:
"The appearance of these warped stones throughout the provinces is too pervasive to be random. More evidence is needed to determine the reason behind them."
—Tamiyo's journal

name: Cathar's Companion
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Cathar's Companion gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text:
"Unwavering and loyal, they represent stability in uncertain times."
—Rem Karolus, Slayer of Angels

name: Chaplain's Blessing
oracle_text: You gain 5 life.
flavor_text: "There was a time when the purpose of the church was to heal and protect. I would see that time return."

name: Clip Wings
oracle_text: Each opponent sacrifices a creature with flying.
flavor_text: It is a grim duty to save the world from those created to protect it.

name: Confront the Unknown
oracle_text: Investigate, then target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Clue you control. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor_text:
"Never flinch from the truth."
—Thalia, Guardian of Thraben

card_faces.name: Convicted Killer
card_faces.oracle_text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Convicted Killer.
card_faces.flavor_text: None are more dangerous than those who have already been sentenced to death.

card_faces.name: Branded Howler
card_faces.oracle_text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Branded Howler.
card_faces.flavor_text: It is said that one of the most notorious werewolf howlpacks, the Vildin, only calls those whose hands are already stained with blood.

name: Crow of Dark Tidings
oracle_text:
Flying
When Crow of Dark Tidings enters the battlefield or dies, mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)

name: Dauntless Cathar
oracle_text: {1}{W}, Exile Dauntless Cathar from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: "The harder they try to extinguish my faith, the brighter it burns in the darkness."

name: Dead Weight
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
flavor_text:
"Dungeons and cages offer far too little sport."
—Relio Voldaren

name: Deny Existence
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
flavor_text: When all logical solutions fail, try an illogical one.

name: Devilthorn Fox
flavor_text: On expeditions through Ashmouth, the hunters of Devilthorn Lodge rely on the cleverness of foxes to counteract the mischief of devils.

name: Drownyard Explorers
oracle_text: When Drownyard Explorers enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor_text: "Angels and inquisitors terrorize villages, but no one seems to notice the stirring out at sea."

name: Dual Shot
oracle_text: Dual Shot deals 1 damage to each of up to two target creatures.
flavor_text: There is an eagerness among the Quiver of Kessig to prove they are the equal of the other cathar orders.

name: Ember-Eye Wolf
oracle_text:
Haste
{1}{R}: Ember-Eye Wolf gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: No howl. No snarl. Just the roar of flames.

name: Emissary of the Sleepless
oracle_text:
Flying
When Emissary of the Sleepless enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

name: Equestrian Skill
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
As long as enchanted creature is a Human, it has trample.
flavor_text: From the jagged peaks of Stensia, to the tangled woods of Kessig, to the bogs of Nephalia, the Gavony Riders prepare for all terrain.

name: Ethereal Guidance
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The call of the Blessed Sleep is not so strong as the call to protect those in need."
—Saint Traft

name: Explosive Apparatus
oracle_text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Explosive Apparatus: It deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"Souls are volatile things. When compressed and loaded into a handheld device, their destructive potential is quite impressive."
—Dierk, geistmage

name: Expose Evil
oracle_text:
Tap up to two target creatures.
Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor_text:
"Only the pure stand tall in the light."
—Sigarda

name: Farbog Revenant
oracle_text:
Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: Spiteful geists rise from the muck of the Farbogs, eager to lure travelers to their doom.

name: Fiery Temper
oracle_text:
Fiery Temper deals 3 damage to any target.
Madness {R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: "Let the flames ignore the sinless."

name: Fork in the Road
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and reveal them. Put one into your hand and the other into your graveyard. Then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"This is as far as I go."
—Beckram, Skiltfolk escort

name: Furtive Homunculus
oracle_text: Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
flavor_text:
"In terms of intelligence, homunculi are somewhere between humans and skaabs—clever enough to follow more complex orders, but dim enough to not question them."
—Stitcher Geralf

card_faces.name: Gatstaf Arsonists
card_faces.oracle_text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Gatstaf Arsonists.
card_faces.flavor_text: The glow in their eyes reveals more than anger or madness.

card_faces.name: Gatstaf Ravagers
card_faces.oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Gatstaf Ravagers.

name: Ghostly Wings
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.
Discard a card: Return enchanted creature to its owner's hand.

name: Ghoulcaller's Accomplice
oracle_text: {3}{B}, Exile Ghoulcaller's Accomplice from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: "Once in the box, we're all the same."

name: Gone Missing
oracle_text:
Put target permanent on top of its owner's library.
Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor_text:
"Sometimes it's best for the lost to stay lost."
—Herzag, mayor of Havengul

name: Grotesque Mutation
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

card_faces.name: Hinterland Logger
card_faces.oracle_text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Hinterland Logger.
card_faces.flavor_text:
"There's a forester lives up in the highlands. Tried to sell her one of my finest axes at a bargain, but she wasn't interested."
—Old Rutstein

card_faces.name: Timber Shredder
card_faces.oracle_text:
Trample
At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Timber Shredder.
card_faces.flavor_text:
"She even had the audacity to criticize my wares as inferior."
—Old Rutstein

name: Hound of the Farbogs
oracle_text: Delirium — Hound of the Farbogs has menace as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: As you hear it baying in the distance, you'll feel its breath on your neck.

name: Howlpack Wolf
oracle_text: Howlpack Wolf can't block unless you control another Wolf or Werewolf.
flavor_text: Wolves and werewolves join together for the common cause of the hunt.

name: Hulking Devil
flavor_text: Fear the patient devil, the one who is calm in the midst of chaos. Beware the silent devil, the one whose cackle does not mingle with the others.

name: Inquisitor's Ox
oracle_text: Delirium — Inquisitor's Ox gets +1/+0 and has vigilance as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text: Many fields now lie fallow in Gavony, as the oxen have been confiscated to perform other duties.

name: Insolent Neonate
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Discard a card, Sacrifice Insolent Neonate: Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Manners are for mortals."

name: Inspiring Captain
oracle_text: When Inspiring Captain enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Our enemies will soon discover that we are not as meek as they had believed."

name: Intrepid Provisioner
oracle_text:
Trample
When Intrepid Provisioner enters the battlefield, another target Human you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "How do I know where aid is needed? Look around you."

name: Jace's Scrutiny
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor_text: "Just a collage of images: cryptoliths, the sea, a tangle of shipwrecks."

name: Just the Wind
oracle_text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Madness {U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: "There's nothing to worry about."

name: Kessig Dire Swine
oracle_text: Delirium — Kessig Dire Swine has trample as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text: In the quiet of the Somberwald, new horrors stir.

name: Lamplighter of Selhoff
oracle_text: When Lamplighter of Selhoff enters the battlefield, if you control another Zombie, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor_text: For stitchers and necro-alchemists, it's important that work can continue at all hours.

name: Loam Dryad
oracle_text: {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text:
"I've never known dryads to suffer visitors in their woods. Beware the Ulvenwald when she welcomes you."
—Alena, trapper of Kessig

name: Macabre Waltz
oracle_text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card.
flavor_text: Liliana is never one to follow someone else's lead.

name: Magmatic Chasm
oracle_text: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
flavor_text: The Needle's Eye, a seldom-used passage that winds through Stensia's mountains, carries travelers close to Ashmouth—too close, some would argue.

name: Merciless Resolve
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or land.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: "You sought to anger me, Nahiri. Soon you will see how well you have succeeded."

name: Might Beyond Reason
oracle_text:
Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
Delirium — Put three +1/+1 counters on that creature instead if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

name: Militant Inquisitor
oracle_text: Militant Inquisitor gets +1/+0 for each Equipment you control.
flavor_text: "I am an instrument of the church wielded against Avacyn's enemies."

name: Moldgraf Scavenger
oracle_text: Delirium — Moldgraf Scavenger gets +3/+0 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"When I was a child, we worried about picking the wrong mushrooms for the cook pot. Now we must worry about being picked ourselves."
—Halana, Kessig ranger

name: Moorland Drifter
oracle_text: Delirium — Moorland Drifter has flying as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text: It has no apparent purpose or direction. It simply drifts, buoyed by breezes both tangible and otherworldly.

name: Murderous Compulsion
oracle_text:
Destroy target tapped creature.
Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: "Thank you. This blade becomes so hot in my hand, but your blood has quenched it."

name: Nagging Thoughts
oracle_text:
Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
Madness {1}{U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Niblis of Dusk
oracle_text:
Flying
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: It fuels its lanterns by leaching the warmth from its surroundings.

name: Pieces of the Puzzle
oracle_text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text: "The clues have begun to reveal a truth I hesitate to accept."

name: Press for Answers
oracle_text:
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

name: Puncturing Light
oracle_text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature with power 3 or less.
flavor_text: "If you refuse to see the light, then you will feel it."

name: Pyre Hound
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Pyre Hound.
flavor_text: Its growl is the crackling and popping of a wildfire untamed.

name: Quilled Wolf
oracle_text: {5}{G}: Quilled Wolf gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I know a ranger that thought to make a cloak of its hide. He ended up losing an eye for his trouble."
—Raf Gyel of the Quiver of Kessig

name: Rabid Bite
oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
flavor_text:
"You should have seen the look on *both* their faces."
—Morkamp, Lambholt innkeeper

name: Rancid Rats
oracle_text:
Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: "They're in the walls! Can't you hear them?"

name: Reduce to Ashes
oracle_text: Reduce to Ashes deals 5 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: Previously the training center for cathars, the Elgaud Grounds are now used by the Lunarch Inquisition to punish those considered to be heretics.

name: Root Out
oracle_text:
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

name: Rottenheart Ghoul
oracle_text: When Rottenheart Ghoul dies, target player discards a card.
flavor_text:
"To die failing to save a loved one is just so sad—or, more to the point, pathetic."
—Liliana Vess

name: Rush of Adrenaline
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: Scarecrows only go so far in sending the message to stay away.

name: Sanguinary Mage
oracle_text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: New cults rising in Nephalia have found allies in the Stromkirk bloodline, whose progenitor worships ancient and terrible forces.

name: Sanitarium Skeleton
oracle_text: {2}{B}: Return Sanitarium Skeleton from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: His mind was lost long before his flesh.

name: Seagraf Skaab
flavor_text:
"Your recent work is an inspiration. I have the utmost respect for your approach, and your craft is impeccable. At your convenience, I would be honored to collaborate on a project."
—Ludevic, letter to Geralf

name: Senseless Rage
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Shamble Back
oracle_text: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Lost loved ones are never truly gone.

name: Shard of Broken Glass
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0.
Whenever equipped creature attacks, you may mill two cards.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Silburlind Snapper
oracle_text: Silburlind Snapper can't attack unless you've cast a noncreature spell this turn.
flavor_text: Nephalia is home to many hard-shelled creatures of unusual size, the largest of which are either avoided or worshipped.

name: Silent Observer
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: It's not just a feeling—you *are* being watched.

name: Sleep Paralysis
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Sleep Paralysis enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: Sleep doesn't always mean rest.

name: Solitary Hunter // One of the Pack
type_line: Creature — Human Warrior Werewolf // Creature — Werewolf

card_faces.name: Solitary Hunter
card_faces.oracle_text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Solitary Hunter.
card_faces.flavor_text: "Making a living in Kessig is hard, but I've learned some tricks of the trade."

card_faces.name: One of the Pack
card_faces.oracle_text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform One of the Pack.
card_faces.flavor_text: When the howl beckons, he cannot resist the urge to join the others.

all_parts.name: Solitary Hunter // One of the Pack
all_parts.type_line: Creature — Human Warrior Werewolf // Creature — Werewolf

name: Stallion of Ashmouth
oracle_text: Delirium — {1}{B}: Stallion of Ashmouth gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text: Echoing hoofbeats can no longer be assumed to be help from the Gavony Riders.

name: Stern Constable
oracle_text: {T}, Discard a card: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: "I'm sure you have a story. Everyone has a story. You can tell it to the bars."

name: Stitched Mangler
oracle_text:
Stitched Mangler enters the battlefield tapped.
When Stitched Mangler enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: Stoic Builder
oracle_text: When Stoic Builder enters the battlefield, you may return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Some have returned to Hollowhenge, the ruins of Avabruck, to restore the lost capital of Kessig.

name: Stormrider Spirit
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
flavor_text: Thunder isn't all that follows lightning.

name: Strength of Arms
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you control an Equipment, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.
flavor_text:
"We fight not for Avacyn, but for her ideals; not for the church, but for its people."
—Thalia, Guardian of Thraben

name: Stromkirk Mentor
oracle_text: When Stromkirk Mentor enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target Vampire you control.
flavor_text: The lineage of Runo Stromkirk is known for producing some of Nephalia's greatest fencing masters.

name: Structural Distortion
oracle_text: Exile target artifact or land. Structural Distortion deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.
flavor_text:
"As Zendikar has bled, so will Innistrad. As I have wept, so will Sorin."
—Nahiri

name: Survive the Night
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor_text: The longest nights are measured not in hours, but in heartbeats.

name: Thornhide Wolves
flavor_text:
"Halana grew brambles to create a barricade around our camp, hoping that it would keep the wolves out. That was a mistake for which we almost paid dearly."
—Alena, trapper of Kessig

name: Thraben Inspector
oracle_text: When Thraben Inspector enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor_text: "If you've been at this as long as I have, nothing can surprise you. That's the hope, at least."

name: Throttle
oracle_text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Victim discovered at dawn with mouth agape and eyes bulging. No evidence of blood loss or dismemberment. Severe bruising around the neck."
—Vallon, Thraben inspector

name: Tormenting Voice
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"The voice has grown louder, its accusations angrier and more insistent. By morning, it will likely drown out all else. I fear what I will do."
—Letter discovered in an abandoned estate

name: True-Faith Censer
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.
As long as equipped creature is a Human, it gets an additional +1/+0.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Twins of Maurer Estate
oracle_text: Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text:
"Children, where are your parents?"
—Reig, wandering monk, last words

name: Uncaged Fury
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text:
"It's right to fear those that you keep locked away."
—Rahilda, Vildin-Pack alpha

name: Unruly Mob
oracle_text: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Unruly Mob.
flavor_text:
"Those who aren't welcome will know it!"
—Kolman, elder of Gatstaf

name: Vampire Noble
flavor_text:
"No emergency is so dire that it cannot be dealt with elegantly."
—Olivia Voldaren

name: Vessel of Ephemera
oracle_text: {2}{W}, Sacrifice Vessel of Ephemera: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
flavor_text: Geists seeking redemption must first be given the opportunity.

name: Vessel of Malignity
oracle_text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice Vessel of Malignity: Target opponent exiles two cards from their hand. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: From within its prison, the book endlessly whispers words of cruelty and spite.

name: Vessel of Nascency
oracle_text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Vessel of Nascency: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

name: Vessel of Paramnesia
oracle_text: {U}, Sacrifice Vessel of Paramnesia: Target player mills three cards. Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Write everything down. Trust me."
—Vallon, Thraben inspector

name: Vessel of Volatility
oracle_text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice Vessel of Volatility: Add {R}{R}{R}{R}.
flavor_text:
"To be honest, I'm not quite sure what's going to happen."
—Renna, Selhoff alchemist

name: Voldaren Duelist
oracle_text:
Haste
When Voldaren Duelist enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: "I have yet to find my equal."

name: Warped Landscape
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Warped Landscape: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Each cryptolith twists the plane's mana, bending its flow to a singular purpose.

name: Watcher in the Web
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Watcher in the Web can block an additional seven creatures each combat.
flavor_text: "Lost in the woods" is an optimistic way to describe a villager's disappearance. "Found in the woods" is frequently more appropriate.

name: Wicker Witch
flavor_text: When there were no more crows to scare, it focused its efforts elsewhere.
